page_content:
Getting a MissionOS Portal Instance

Version:MissionOS_2.0

Place a request to MGS Technical Support team either by email at mgs_support@maxwellgeosystems.com or by Skype at mgs_techsupport.

The pre-requisites for the portal are:

  1. Domain name - If the client has a domain of their own, the client can provide the details to Maxwell GeoSystems, otherwise the purchase is made. By default, the domain name is maxwellgeosystemsXX.com
  2. Portal subdomain name (myportalname.domainname.com)
  3. Region
  4. The expected number of instruments and the frequency of readings

The support team sets up the MissionOS portal with basic metadata configuration. Additionally, a sandpit portal is also created at the same region, which is an exact copy of this portal. All changes, fixes and new requirements are first applied on the sandpit for verification. Once the client confirms the changes, they are moved to live portal.
